title: Property Type
description: Types of addressable advertising properties with verifiable ownership. Property types are a subset of media channels - they represent inventory surfaces that can be validated via adagents.json.

enumDescriptions.website: Web properties accessible via browser, identified by domain
enumDescriptions.mobile_app: Native mobile applications, identified by app store IDs or bundle identifiers
enumDescriptions.ctv_app: Connected TV applications, identified by platform-specific store IDs
enumDescriptions.desktop_app: Desktop applications (Electron, native, Chromium wrappers), identified by application bundle IDs
enumDescriptions.dooh: Digital out-of-home screen networks, identified by network/venue IDs
enumDescriptions.podcast: Podcast feeds and episodes, identified by RSS feed URLs or podcast IDs
enumDescriptions.radio: Radio station properties, identified by call signs or station IDs
enumDescriptions.streaming_audio: Digital audio streaming properties, identified by platform-specific IDs
